name: Captain Lennox
Lore: 'Captain of the Imperial Star Destroyer Tyrant. An able leader. Unlike most Imperial officers, he is dedicated to his ship and crew. Finds political maneuvering distasteful.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots (3 if starship is Tyrant). When on a Star Destroyer, may use its tractor beam once during each of your control phases.',
